description:
The Salewa Wildfire Leather is a precise-fitting, comfortable shoe. Its solid construction is ideal for everyday use, yet provides reliable support for mountain approaches, technical scrambles and even easy alpine climbs.

Strong, soft suede:

The high-quality, strong yet soft and velvety 1.4 mm suede upper is protected by a 360° polyurethane rand. We further reinforce the upper with our proprietary 3F system. With its robust Kevlar cables, it wraps your foot and gives you flexibility, a precise fit and firm ankle and heel support.

Sure-footed contact:

Underfoot, the POMOCA outsole provides superb grip and sure-footed contact. The aggressive tread lugs ensure good traction on mud and softer terrain. In addition, the climbing zone and unique POMOCA rubber compound provide a superb friction contact on flat rock and smaller edges.

The climbing lacing system is easy to adjust and further supports the wrapping fit. Inside, a breathable OrthoLite footbed provides superior comfort and also wicks away moisture fast to help keep your feet cool and dry.

The Wildfire Leather is our comfortable tech approach shoe with climbing capability for trekking and everyday life.
name: Salewa Wildfire Leather - Mens
